resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/78180</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>78180</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>b0c2e97f-d49a-4cbc-824d-7d9b8b16b4d4#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az emésztés és a felszívódás</string>
            <string language="en">Digestion and absorption</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verdauung und Absorption</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Digestion et absorption</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Digestão e absorption</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Digestione ed assorbimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πέψη και απορρόφηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Digestión y absorción</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az emésztőnedvek hatására a nagy molekulájú szerves tápanyagok építőköveikre bomlanak, majd a megemésztett tápanyagok a bélhámsejteken keresztül felszívódnak a vérbe.</string>
            <string language="en">As a result of gastric juices the big molecular organic nutriments resolve into their building stones, then the digested nutriments are absorbed to blood through the intestinal epithelial cell</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">emésztés,  felszívódás,  táplálkozás,  középbél,  </string>
            <string language="en">digestion, absorption, alimentation, middle-bowel</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Resultierend aus gastrischen Säften, welche die 
grossen molekularen organischen nutriments in ihre Bausteine, dann die
verdauten nutriments beheben, werden zum Blut durch die intestinale 
Epithelzelle aufgesogen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En raison des jus gastriques que les grands 
nutriments organiques moléculaires résolvent en leurs pierres de 
bâtiment, alors les nutriments assimilés sont absorbés au sang 
par la cellule épithéliale intestinale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em conseqüência dos sucos que gastric os 
nutriments orgânicos molecular grandes resolvem em suas pedras de 
edifício, os nutriments digeridos são absorvidos então ao sangue 
através da pilha epithelial intestinal</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come conseguenza delle spremute che gastriche i 
nutriments organici molecolari grandi risolvono nelle loro pietre da 
costruzione, allora i nutriments digeriti sono assorbiti ad anima 
attraverso la cellula epiteliale intestinale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ως αποτέλεσμα των γαστρικών χυμών οι μεγάλες μοριακές
οργανικές τροφές επιλύουν στις πέτρες κτηρίου τους, κατόπιν οι 
αφομοιωμένες τροφές απορροφώνται στο αίμα μέσω του εντερικού 
epithelial κυττάρου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Como resultado de los jugos gástricos que los 
nutriments orgánicos moleculares grandes resuelven en sus piedras de 
edificio, entonces los nutriments digeridos se absorben a la sangre a 
través de la célula epitelial intestinal</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verdauung, Absorption, Alimentation, Mittlerdarm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">digestion, absorption, alimentation, moyen-entrailles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">digestão, absorption, alimentation, 
médio-middle-bowel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">digestione, assorbimento, alimentation, 
centrale-viscere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πέψη, απορρόφηση, διατροφή, μέσος-έντερο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">digestión, absorción, alimentación, medio-intestino</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>78180</entry>
    </identifier>
